subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Golf wasn't truly a global game until Gary Player came along. In 1962, when the South African won the P.G.A. Championship for the first time, he was one of only four international players in the field.
snippet: Golf wasn't truly a global game until Gary Player came along. In 1962, when the South African won the P.G.A. Championship for the first time, he was one of only four international players in the field.
